{"id":370303972,"lang":"cpp","time":"1 year, 9 months","timestamp":1595457859,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"208 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/370303972/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Valid Palindrome II","memory":"19.5 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    bool validPalindrome(string s) {\n        \n        \n        \n        bool skipped = false; \n        bool found = true; \n        \n        int i = 0; \n        int j = s.length() - 1; \n        \n        while(i < j) {\n            if (s[i] != s[j]) {\n                --j;\n                if (skipped) {\n                    found = false;\n                    break;\n                } else {\n                    skipped = true; \n                }\n            } else {\n                --j;\n                ++i; \n            }\n        }\n        \n        if (found) {\n            return true; \n        }\n        i = 0; \n        j = s.length() - 1; \n        found = true; \n        skipped = false;\n        while(i < j) {\n            if (s[i] != s[j]) {\n                ++i; \n                if (skipped) {\n                    found = false; \n                    break;\n                } else {\n                    skipped = true; \n                }\n            } else {\n                --j;\n                ++i;\n            }\n        }\n        \n        if (found) {\n            return true;\n        }\n        return false; \n        \n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"valid-palindrome-ii"}
